import React,{useEffect, useState} from 'react' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import SidePanel from '../Components/SidePanel' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table' import '../Styling/Register.css' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Accordion from 'react-bootstrap/Accordion' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' const AttendanceRegister = () => { const [date,setDate] = useState('') const [timeIn,setTimeIn] = useState('') const [timeOut,setTimeOut] = useState('') const [activities,setActivities] = useState('') const [sign,setSign] = useState('') const [checkedBy,setCheckedBy] = useState('') const [submittedData,setSubmittedData] = useState([]) function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() const attendanceData = { date, timeIn, timeOut, activities, sign, checkedBy } fetch('/attendances',{ method: "POST", headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify(attendanceData) }) .then(res=> res.json()) .then(data=> console.log(data)) setDate(' ') setTimeIn(' ') setTimeOut(' ') setActivities(' ') setSign('') setCheckedBy('') } useEffect(()=>{ fetch('/attendances') .then(res => res.json()) .then(resdata => setSubmittedData(resdata)) },[]) const displayNewAttendanceData = submittedData.map((sd)=>( {sd.date} {sd.timeIn} {sd.timeOut} {sd.activities} {sd.sign} {sd.checkedBy} )) return ( <>

G

User NAME

Position

Email

Add Targets
setDate(e.target.value)} type="text" value={date} placeholder="Enter date" /> setTimeIn(e.target.value)} placeholder='Time In' as="textarea" rows={3} /> setTimeOut(e.target.value)} placeholder='Time Out' as="textarea" rows={3} /> setActivities(e.target.value)} placeholder='Activities' as="textarea" rows={3} /> setSign(e.target.value)} placeholder='Sign' as="textarea" rows={3} /> setCheckedBy(e.target.value)} placeholder='CheckedBy' as="textarea" rows={3} />
{displayNewAttendanceData}
Date TimeIn Time Out Activities Sign Checked By:
1/7/2022 0800 1700 Web Dev G.G Jane
) } export default AttendanceRegister
